gems.Name: Berserker's Eye
gems.Base Effect: All damage dealt +5.50%, but damage taken +5%
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Increases all damage you deal by 16%, but also increases all damage you take by 5%. Additionally, your Critical Hit Chance is increased by 2%.

gems.Name: Blessed Pebble
gems.Base Effect: Duration of beneficial effects increased by 8.00%
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Increases the duration of beneficial effects on you by 12% and increases your Movement Speed by 8% for 3 seconds after gaining a beneficial effect.

gems.Name: Blessing of the Worthy
gems.Base Effect: 20% chance when taking damage to deal 12% of max life to nearby enemies
gems.Rank 10 Effect: When you take damage, you have a 20% chance to unleash retribution on all nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to 24% of your maximum Life. Additionally, your Life recovery rate is increased by 10% for 6 seconds after the effect triggers.

gems.Name: Blood-Soaked Jade
gems.Base Effect: Up to 8% increased damage at full life (min 4% at low life), +10% Movement Speed
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Increases all damage you deal by up to 32% and your Movement Speed by 20%. The damage bonus decreases as your Life decreases, but the minimum bonus is 16%. Additionally, your attacks heal you for 2% of damage dealt while the bonus is active.

gems.Name: Ca'arsen's Invigoration
gems.Base Effect: Primary Attack speed increased by 5.50%
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Increases the speed of your Primary Attack by 16% and the damage of your Primary Attack by 2%.

gems.Name: Chained Death
gems.Base Effect: Damage +1.50% per target hit (max 4.5% with 3 targets)
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Increases damage done by your attacks by 4.5% per target hit, up to a maximum of 18% with 4 targets.

gems.Name: Chip of Stoned Flesh
gems.Base Effect: Loss of control applies explosive curse dealing 45% of damage taken (max 150% base)
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Explosive curse deals 300% base damage to nearby enemies when control effects expire. Additionally, enemies hit by the explosion take 10% increased damage for 5 seconds.

gems.Name: Cutthroat's Grin
gems.Base Effect: Gain 8.00% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind

gems.Name: Everlasting Torment
gems.Base Effect: Critical hits cause agony: 10% base damage + 122/sec for 6s
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your critical hits inflict agony, dealing 16.7% base damage + 202 every second for 3 seconds. Each enemy cannot be affected by this more often than once every 6 seconds. Additionally, you gain 6% increased attack speed while any enemy is suffering from your agony.

gems.Name: Fervent Fang
gems.Base Effect: Each hit increases damage by 0.80%, up to 0.80*10% at 10 stacks
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Each time you deal damage to an enemy, that enemy now takes 2.4% increased damage from your attacks, up to a maximum increase of 24% at 10 stacks. Additionally, you deal 6% increased damage to Elite monsters.

gems.Name: Follower's Burden
gems.Base Effect: Increases damage by 1.00% for each summon, up to maximum increase of 6%
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Increases all damage you deal by 3% for each summon you control, up to a maximum increase of 18%. Additionally, your summons take 6% reduced damage.

gems.Name: Frozen Heart
gems.Base Effect: When damaged, activates Frigid Shield absorbing 150% base damage + 1,458
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Reduces damage taken by 32% while your Life is below 50%. Additionally, periodically freezes nearby enemies, dealing 240% base damage and chilling them.

gems.Name: Hellfire Fragment
gems.Base Effect: Conjures 3 hellfire blazes dealing 45% base damage + 510
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Using a skill conjures 3 hellfire blazes around you to seek out enemies within 6 yards, exploding on them dealing 108% base damage + 510 to all nearby enemies. Enemies struck by multiple hellfire blazes take 50% additional damage from subsequent hits. Cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds.

gems.Name: Kir Sling
gems.Base Effect: 15% chance when attacked to release burst of light that Blinds enemies for 1.30 seconds
gems.Rank 10 Effect: You have a 25% chance when attacked to release a burst of light that Blinds all nearby enemies, reducing their vision and causing total loss of control for 3 seconds. Additionally, you deal 6% increased damage to Blinded enemies.

gems.Name: Lightning Core
gems.Base Effect: Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your Primary Attacks and movement slowly charge you with electricity. When fully charged, your next Primary Attack will release chain lightning, dealing 180% base damage + 1,800 to nearby enemies. Additionally, you gain a 12% increased chance to critically strike while fully charged.

gems.Name: Mocking Laughter
gems.Base Effect: Primary Attack forces non-Elite monsters to attack you for 2.00 seconds
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your Primary Attack forces non-Elite monsters it hits to attack you for 2 seconds. Additionally, you take 2% reduced damage from monsters affected by Mocking Laughter.

gems.Name: Mother's Lament
gems.Base Effect: When you deal damage, you have a 20% chance to gain Maternal Disdain, increasing your Critical Hit Chance by 12% for 6 seconds. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds. When Maternal Disdain ends, you release a blood spike toward nearby enemies, dealing base damage and causing them to Bleed.
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Maternal Disdain, increasing your Critical Hit Chance by 20% for 6 seconds. When Maternal Disdain ends, you release a blood spike toward nearby enemies, dealing 300% base damage and causing them to Bleed for 50% base damage over 5 seconds.

gems.Name: Pain Clasp
gems.Base Effect: Increases damage dealt by 8.00% to enemies suffering from continuous damage effect
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Increases damage dealt by 16% to enemies suffering from a continuous damage effect. Additionally, enemies suffering from continuous damage effects take 8% increased damage from all sources.

gems.Name: Pain of Subjugation
gems.Base Effect: 5.50% increased damage vs enemies suffering loss of control
gems.Rank 10 Effect: You deal 16% increased damage to enemies suffering loss of control. Additionally, you take 2% reduced damage while suffering loss of control.

gems.Name: Power & Command
gems.Base Effect: Alternates states every 9s: Power increases Primary Attack damage by 8.00%, Command increases skill damage by 8.00%
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Alternates states every 9 seconds. Power increases your Primary Attack damage by 16%. Command increases all other skill damage by 16%. Additionally, you gain 6% increased Movement Speed while either state is active.

gems.Name: Respite Stone
gems.Base Effect: -0.55% damage taken per 10% missing Life (max 5.5%)
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Decreases all damage you take by 5.5% for every 10% your Life is below maximum, up to a maximum damage decrease of 16.5%. Additionally, you gain 4.5% increased Armor while your Life is below 50%.

gems.Name: The Black Rose
gems.Base Effect: 10% chance when attacked to summon vines that Immobilize attacker for 1.10 seconds
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Each time you are attacked, you have a 10% chance to summon vines that Immobilize the attacker for 1.1 seconds. Each enemy cannot be affected by this more often than once every 20 seconds. Additionally, you deal 2% increased damage to Immobilized enemies.

gems.Name: The Hunger
gems.Base Effect: Heal 40% base damage + 567 Life each time you defeat an enemy
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Heal 120% base damage + 1,200 Life each time you defeat an enemy. Additionally, while above 75% Life, you gain a 10% Movement Speed bonus.

gems.Name: Trickshot Gem
gems.Base Effect: Channeled skills consume energy 8.00% slower
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your Channeled skills consume energy 16% slower. Additionally, you take 2% reduced damage while using a Channeled skill.

gems.Name: Viper's Bite
gems.Base Effect: Inflicts Viper's Venom dealing 16% base damage + 120 every second for 6 seconds
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your attacks poison enemies, dealing 32% base damage + 480 every second for 6 seconds. Additionally, poisoned enemies have their Attack Speed reduced by 10%.

gems.Name: Zod Stone
gems.Base Effect: Ultimate Skills duration increased by 16.00%
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Increases the duration of your Ultimate Skills by 16%. Additionally, your Ultimate Skills deal 2% increased damage.

gems.Name: Seled's Weakening
gems.Base Effect: 6.00% increased damage for 60s after killing Elite monster
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Gain 16% increased damage for 60 seconds after killing an Elite monster. Additionally, you deal 2% increased damage to Elite monsters.

gems.Name: Battleguard
gems.Base Effect: Decreases melee damage taken by 8.00% from enemies within 3 yards
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Reduces all melee damage you take from enemies within 3 yards by 24%. Additionally, you move unhindered through enemies while your Life is below 60%.

gems.Name: Bottled Hope
gems.Base Effect: Using a buff increases target's damage and movement speed by 8% for 6s
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Using skills to grant buffs increases damage done and Movement Speed of the target by 12% for 8 seconds. Additionally, the duration of all buffs on you is increased by 4 seconds.

gems.Name: Follower's Burden
gems.Base Effect: Increases damage by 1.00% for each summon, up to maximum increase of 6%

gems.Name: Seeping Bile
gems.Base Effect: 4% chance to poison enemies for 25% base damage + 263/s for 6s, spreads on death
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your attacks have a 6% chance to poison enemies, dealing 40% base damage per second for 8 seconds. Additionally, poisoned enemies spread the effect to others on death.

gems.Name: The Abiding Curse
gems.Base Effect: 15% chance to curse enemies, reducing Attack and Movement Speeds by 35% for 2.50 seconds
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your attacks have a 30% chance to curse enemies, reducing their Attack and Movement Speeds by 50% for 4 seconds. Additionally, cursed enemies take 12% increased damage from all sources.

gems.Name: Bloody Reach
gems.Base Effect: Increases damage by 2.00% for every 2 yards between you and enemy (max 8% at 8 yards)
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your attacks deal 6% increased damage for every 2 yards between you and the enemy hit, up to a maximum of 24% at 8 yards. Additionally, your attacks have a 1.2% chance to decrease enemy Attack and Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds.

gems.Name: Grim Rhythm
gems.Base Effect: Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 0.8% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 9%.
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 2.4% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 12%.

gems.Name: Starfire Shard
gems.Base Effect: When you deal damage, you have a 30% chance to rain meteorites in an area, dealing 200% base damage in total. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds.
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your critical hits have a 30% chance to call down meteorites, dealing 400% base damage to all enemies in the area. Additionally, the meteorites leave burning ground that deals 50% base damage per second for 5 seconds.

gems.Name: The Abiding Curse
gems.Base Effect: 15% chance to curse enemies, reducing Attack and Movement Speeds by 35% for 2.50 seconds

gems.Name: Unity Crystal
gems.Base Effect: You and party members take 0.50% reduced damage per additional party member within 6 yards
gems.Rank 10 Effect: You and all party members take 2% reduced damage per additional party member within 6 yards of you. Additionally, all party members within range gain 4% increased damage reduction when near the Unity Crystal holder.

gems.Name: Volatility Shard
gems.Base Effect: Defeating enemy triggers explosion dealing 30% base damage + 365 to nearby enemies
gems.Rank 10 Effect: When you defeat an enemy, you trigger a volatile explosion dealing 60% base damage + 800 to all nearby enemies. Additionally, enemies hit by the explosion take 12% increased damage for 3 seconds.

gems.Name: Battleguard
gems.Base Effect: Decreases melee damage taken by 8.00% from enemies within 3 yards

gems.Name: Chained Death
gems.Base Effect: Damage +1.50% per target hit (max 4.5% with 3 targets)

gems.Name: Stormvault
gems.Base Effect: Conjures pursuing storm for 6s dealing 22.5% base damage + 203 every 0.5s
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Conjures a storm that deals 40% base damage per second to enemies within its radius. Additionally, lightning strikes periodically hit enemies, dealing 100% base damage.

gems.Name: Trickshot Gem
gems.Base Effect: Channeled skills consume energy 8.00% slower

gems.Name: Cutthroat's Grin
gems.Base Effect: Gain 8.00% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind

gems.Name: Echoing Shade
gems.Base Effect: 15% chance to summon shadow clone for 8s with some abilities
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your attacks have a 20% chance to summon a shadow clone for 12 seconds. Additionally, shadow clones gain 100% of your damage and Life stats.

gems.Name: Follower's Burden
gems.Base Effect: Increases damage by 1.00% for each summon, up to maximum increase of 6%

gems.Name: Phoenix Ashes
gems.Base Effect: Prevents fatal damage and grants shield absorbing 450% base damage
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Prevents fatal damage and grants a shield absorbing 800% base damage for 10 seconds. Additionally, while the shield is active, your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.

gems.Name: Concentrated Will
gems.Base Effect: Dash skill calls guardian angel, deals 55% base damage + 547
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Using a Dash skill summons a guardian angel to your aid, dealing 120% base damage to all enemies in its path. Additionally, your Dash skills have their cooldowns reduced by 2 seconds.

gems.Name: Cutthroat's Grin
gems.Base Effect: Gain 8.00% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Gain 24% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind. Additionally, you deal 4% increased damage while attacking from behind.

gems.Name: Follower's Burden
gems.Base Effect: Increases damage by 1.00% for each summon, up to maximum increase of 6%

gems.Name: Howler's Call
gems.Base Effect: 10% chance on Primary Attack to summon spirit wolf dealing 150% base damage + 1,458
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Primary Attacks have a 20% chance to summon a spirit wolf that deals 240% base damage to all enemies in its path. Additionally, the spirit wolf howls, increasing your damage by 10% for 6 seconds.

gems.Name: Maw of the Deep
gems.Base Effect: Creates whirlpool that pulls enemies, sea monster erupts for 140% base damage + 1701
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Conjures a whirlpool that pulls enemies into its center, dealing 200% base damage over 3 seconds. Additionally, the whirlpool summons a sea monster dealing 400% base damage to enemies within its radius.

gems.Name: Roiling Consequence
gems.Base Effect: Enters roiling rage for 6s, +12% Crit Chance, crits cause explosion dealing 36% base damage over 3s
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Dealing damage increases your Critical Hit Chance by 16% for 6 seconds. Additionally, critical hits deal 20% more damage while Roiling Consequence is active.

gems.Name: Zwenson's Haunting
gems.Base Effect: On enemy defeat, dark beast attacks dealing 50% base damage + 486

gems.Name: Zwenson's Haunting
gems.Base Effect: On enemy defeat, dark beast attacks dealing 50% base damage + 486
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Summons a dark beast to attack nearby enemies after defeating an enemy, dealing 200% base damage. Additionally, the dark beast causes enemies to flee in terror for 2 seconds.

gems.Name: Hellfire Fragment
gems.Base Effect: Conjures 3 hellfire blazes dealing 45% base damage + 510

gems.Name: Spiteful Blood
gems.Base Effect: Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Spiteful Blood to surge through you for 4 seconds, increasing your damage done by 30% and making you invulnerable to Primary Attacks from other players. Additionally, when Spiteful Blood triggers, you gain an absorb shield equal to 160% of your base damage. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds.
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Spiteful Blood to surge, increasing your damage by 40% for 6 seconds and making you invulnerable to damage. Additionally, you gain an absorb shield equal to 200% of your base damage while the effect is active.

gems.Name: Void Spark
gems.Base Effect: Conjures Void Spark for 6s, 30% chance to chain lightning to 8 enemies dealing 45% base damage + 446

gems.Name: Gloom Cask
gems.Base Effect: Primary Attack unleashes Aspect of Gloom for 6s, triggering gloom blades dealing 30% base damage + 275
gems.Rank 10 Effect: Your Primary Attacks unleash an Aspect of Gloom that lasts 10 seconds, during which your Primary Attacks deal 60% additional AoE damage.
